alert.note: Alert for Western Kenai Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 4:52AM AKST until December 27 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Western Kenai Peninsula. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 6 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of very light freezing rain and/or drizzle are possible Monday morning. However, areas of steadier freezing rain are expected to develop by mid afternoon Monday and continue into late Monday night or early Tuesday morning. Freezing rain is then expected to transition back to snow and linger across the area through the day Tuesday with 1 to 4 inches of snow possible by Tuesday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
